sum_radial.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  =================================
00002 !
00003 !    1D gather for spherically symmetric fields
00004 !
00005 !  =================================
00006 
00007 subroutine sum_radial(timestamp)
00008 
00009   use physvars
00010   use treevars
00011   implicit none
00012   include 'mpif.h'
00013 
00014 
00015   integer, intent(in) :: timestamp
00016   real :: rdr, dr, vweight, jweight, cweight
00017   real :: tweight, erweight, rhalf
00018   real :: xpdum, ypdum, zpdum
00019   real :: fr1, fr2, ra, gamma, xt, yt, zt, rt
00020   real :: ttrav, tfetch
00021   integer :: ndum, i, j, k, ng, i1, i2, nelecs, nions, ngr, icall, ierr, p
00022   character(30) :: cfile
00023   character(5) :: cme
00024   character(6) :: cdump, cvis
00025   real, dimension(0:ngx+1) :: ve_loc, vi_loc, Er_loc, ni_loc, ne_loc, ge_loc, gi_loc
00026   real, dimension(0:ngx+1) :: ve_glob, vi_glob, Er_glob, ni_glob, ne_glob, ge_glob, gi_glob
00027   real, dimension(0:ngx+1) :: volume
00028   real*8, dimension(0:ngx+1) :: ex_g, ey_g, ez_g, phi_g, w_g
00029   integer, dimension(ngx+1) :: pshortl
00030   real :: gmin=1.e-3
00031 
00032   icall = timestamp/ivis_fields
00033 
00034 
00035   ! get filename suffix from dump counter
00036   do i=0,4
00037      cdump(6-i:6-i) =  achar(mod(timestamp/10**i,10) + 48)  
00038   end do
00039   cdump(1:1) = achar(timestamp/10**5 + 48)
00040 
00041   if (my_rank==0) then
00042      write(*,'(//a/a,f10.2)') 'Radial field dump:', &
00043           'writing out densities, fields on grid 0-',xl
00044   endif
00045 
00046   ngr = ngx  ! use box resolution in x for radial distn
00047   dr = xl/ngr
00048 
00049   rdr = 1./dr
00050 
00051   ve_loc = 0.
00052   vi_loc = 0.
00053   ge_loc = 0.
00054   gi_loc = 0.
00055   ne_loc = 0.
00056   ni_loc = 0.
00057   Er_loc = 0.
00058 
00059   !  field box limits assumed to be: (0-xl)
00060   !  Any particle outside gets put in ghost cells ngr+1
00061 
00062   !      write(15,'(//a,3f12.3)') 'cw,dx,dy',cweight,dx,dy
00063 
00064 !  Accumulate local radial moments
00065 
00066   do i=1,npp
00067 
00068 ! particle position relative to plasma centre
00069      xt = x(i)-plasma_centre(1)
00070      yt = y(i)-plasma_centre(2)
00071      zt = z(i)-plasma_centre(3)
00072 
00073 ! radius
00074      rt=sqrt(xt**2+yt**2+zt**2)
00075      ra = rt*rdr
00076 
00077 !  indices - include zero for r=0
00078      i1=ra+.5
00079      i2=i1+1
00080 
00081      i1 = min(i1,ngr+1)
00082      i2 = min(i2,ngr+1)
00083 
00084      !  linear weighting
00085 !     fr2=ra-i1  ! Prevent overflow/negative weighting for particles outside box
00086 !     fr1=1.-fr1
00087     ! NGP
00088      fr2=0.
00089      fr1=1.
00090      !  gather charge at nearest grid points
00091      gamma = sqrt(1.0+ux(i)**2+uy(i)**2+uz(i)**2)
00092      cweight = abs(q(i))    !  charge weighting factor - densities computed later 
00093      vweight = sqrt(ux(i)**2+uy(i)**2+uz(i)**2)
00094      erweight =  sqrt(ex(i)**2+ey(i)**2+ez(i)**2)
00095 
00096      tweight = (gamma-1.)  ! K.E. of particle in keV
00097 
00098      if (q(i)<0) then
00099         ve_loc(i1) = ve_loc(i1) + fr1*vweight    
00100         ve_loc(i2) = ve_loc(i2) + fr2*vweight  
00101 
00102         ne_loc(i1) = ne_loc(i1) + fr1*cweight
00103         ne_loc(i2) = ne_loc(i2) + fr2*cweight
00104 
00105         ge_loc(i1) = ge_loc(i1) + fr1  ! weighted # electrons at r
00106         ge_loc(i2) = ge_loc(i2) + fr2
00107 
00108      else
00109         vi_loc(i1) = vi_loc(i1) + fr1*vweight  ! TODO: This won't give multi-valued vel
00110         vi_loc(i2) = vi_loc(i2) + fr2*vweight  ! beyond shock front - need phase space!
00111 
00112         ni_loc(i1) = ni_loc(i1) + fr1*cweight
00113         ni_loc(i2) = ni_loc(i2) + fr2*cweight
00114 
00115         gi_loc(i1) = gi_loc(i1) + fr1  ! weighted # ions at r
00116         gi_loc(i2) = gi_loc(i2) + fr2
00117 
00118      endif
00119 
00120   end do
00121 
00122 
00123   volume(1:ngr+1) = (/ (4./3.*pi*((i*dr+.5*dr)**3-(i*dr-.5*dr)**3), i=1,ngr+1) /)
00124 !  ni_loc(1) = ni_loc(1) + ni_loc(0)  ! Fold charge at r=0 onto r=dr
00125 !  ne_loc(1) = ne_loc(1) + ne_loc(0)
00126   volume(0) = 4./3.*pi*(dr/2.)**3  ! 1/2-vol weight for r=0
00127 
00128 !  Renormalise charge densities with volume-weighting
00129   ni_loc = ni_loc/volume
00130   ne_loc = ne_loc/volume
00131 
00132 
00133 ! Gather partial sums together to get global moments - arrays run from (0:ngr)
00134  
00135   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(ge_loc, ge_glob, ngr+1, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00136   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(gi_loc, gi_glob, ngr+1, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00137   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(ve_loc, ve_glob, ngr+1, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00138   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(vi_loc, vi_glob, ngr+1, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00139   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(ne_loc, ne_glob, ngr+1, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00140   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(ni_loc, ni_glob, ngr+1, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00141 
00142   ge_glob = max(gmin,ge_glob)
00143   gi_glob = max(gmin,gi_glob)
00144 
00145   ! normalise averaged quantities
00146   nelecs = SUM(ge_glob(1:ngr))
00147   nions = SUM(gi_glob(1:ngr))
00148  if (my_rank==0) then
00149         write(*,*) "Charge check:",nelecs,nions
00150  endif
00151   ve_glob = ve_glob/ge_glob
00152   vi_glob = vi_glob/gi_glob
00153 
00154 ! Radial fields - set up dummy particles & find forces directly from tree
00155 ! Dummies set up at end of particle arrays on root to ensure unique labelling
00156     if (my_rank==0) then
00157     do i=1,ngr+1
00158         
00159         p = npp+i   !index
00160         pshortl(i) = p   !index
00161         x(p) = (i-1)*dr + plasma_centre(1)   ! radius - include r=0
00162         y(p) = plasma_centre(2)
00163         z(p) = plasma_centre(3)
00164      end do
00165 ! Get interaction lists
00166 !     write (*,*) 'Doing lists for dummy particles'
00167 !     write (*,'((i8,f12.3))') (pshortl(i),x(pshortl(i)),i=1,ngr+1)
00168      ndum = ngr+1
00169    else
00170      ndum=0      
00171    endif  
00172 
00173 ! all PEs must call walk
00174 
00175    call tree_walk(pshortl(1:ndum),ndum,1,theta,eps,itime,mac,ttrav,tfetch)
00176 
00177    if (my_rank==0) then
00178 ! Fields
00179      do i=1,ngr+1
00180         p=pshortl(i)
00181         call sum_force(p, nterm(i), nodelist( 1:nterm(i),i), eps, &
00182              ex_g(i-1), ey_g(i-1), ez_g(i-1), phi_g(i-1), w_g(i-1))
00183      end do
00184  
00185      Er_glob(0:ngr) = force_const*Ex_g(0:ngr)    !  Radial field
00186   endif
00187 
00188 ! Write out to file
00189 
00190   if (my_rank == 0) then
00191      write(*,*) 'number density integrals: ',nelecs, nions
00192      cfile = "fields/radial."//cdump
00193      open (60,file=cfile)
00194      write(60,'(9(a12))') '!   r      ',' r/r0   ','ne    ','ni   ','rhoe   ','rhoi   ','ve   ','vi   ','er'
00195      write(60,'((10(1pe12.4)))') &
00196           (i*dr, i*dr/r_layer(1), ge_glob(i)/max(1,ne), gi_glob(i)/max(1,ni), max(ne_glob(i),1.e-10), max(ni_glob(i),1.e-10), ve_glob(i), vi_glob(i), max(er_glob(i),1.e-10), phi_g(i), i=0,ngr)
00197      close(60)
00198 
00199   endif
00200   icall = icall + 1
00201 
00202 end subroutine sum_radial
00203

00205 
00206
